thread.section_title: Avas Flowers Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Avas Flowers | avasflowers.com | 6 of 317
thread.title: cherlonmalik

author: cherlonmalik
title: cherlonmalik
text: We sent flowers for a co-worker who had lost their parent. The agent was superb at explaining in detail what the item would look like and was spectacular in their ability to take the order with such professionalism, they even helped with decoration suggestions. Great knowledge of the whole process and even called delivery driver while I was on hold to ensure our flowers got there....Going the extra mile for us
